steps.step: Beat Butter in a bowl for 2 minutes with a mixer until creamy. Mix in Sugar and Brown Sugar for 2 minutes. Mix in Peanut Butter and Egg until mixed thoroughly. Mix Flour, Baking Soda, Baking Powder, and Salt until mixed thoroughly. Wrap dough in plastic and refrigerate for at least 3 hours

Shape dough into 1 inch balls. Place dough balls 3 inches apart on an ungreased cookie sheet. Flatten cookies with a fork in a criss-cross pattern. Bake at 375F for 9-10 minutes until lightly browned. Cool on a wire rack
